summary: Cleans up The Stumbling Sabrecat, adding an inkeeper and some NPCs.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/QtD7v94.png[/img][/url][/center]

This mod was a request to extract the restored [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:The_Stumbling_Sabrecat]Stumbling Sabrecat[/url] inn from my mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35311/?]Showers in Inns[/url], in order to make it standalone. I started this version from scratch, so it is a bit different from the one included in that mod.

The file has been cleaned with TESEDIT, is fully navmeshed, and requires no DLC.

The inn is originally run over by bandits and can only be cleaned up after starting the Imperial questline, but it is never made functional again. I feel it's a nice location for a wilderness retreat, so I made this. The mod adds an innkeeper who will rent you a bed for the usual fare, and some NPCs who mill about the inn; they are all essential in case bloodthirsty bandits may follow you inside. There's also a bathing room in the basement, compatible with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29025]Drink Eat Sleep Bathe[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36898/?]ZF Primary Needs[/url].

Similar to what I did with other mods of mine that affect vanilla locations, all the triggers have been left intact; I moved the original door underground and placed a new one that links to a duplicate of the original cell. If you do the quest [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:The_Battle_for_Fort_Dunstad]The Battle for Fort Dunstad[/url] you will not be able to kill the bandits that appear in the original Stumbling Sabrecat, so disable my mod before that quest and enable it again later.

To install, extract the contents of your downloaded file to your "Steam/SteamApps/Common/Skyrim/Data" folder. Then activate the mod through your preferred launcher by ticking the checkbox next to the esp. Have fun!


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
author: Jokerine
